auth-shell.toggleViewSignin: Don't have an account? Create one
auth-shell.toggleViewLogin: Already have an account? Sign in

privacy.title: Privacy Policy and Data Management
privacy.authText: In this application, your data is managed according to best privacy practices.
privacy.minData: Only the minimum data necessary for authentication (email and UID) is stored.
privacy.thirdParty: No personal data is shared with third parties.
privacy.firebaseSession: Session storage is managed through Firebase Authentication.
privacy.deleteData: You can request deletion of your data at any time by contacting the following email:
privacy.acceptTermsText: By continuing to use this application, you accept this privacy policy and the management of your data according to these terms.

register.registersuccess: Account successfully created. You can now log in.
